title: rustfmt
description: A tool for formatting Rust code

title: Rust Language Server (RLS)
description:
The engine behind the Rust IDE experience. Manages builds and data about Rust programs to provide features like 'goto def' and 'type on hover'.

Note that the impl period testing issues are about implementing testing frameworks, not just writing tests.

title: RLS editor support
description: Support Rust in new editors using the RLS. We'll start by focussing on Atom, but if you're keen on supporting other editors, that is useful too.

title: RLS in Visual Studio Code
description: Core Rust IDE support. Implemented by having VSCode be a client of the RLS.

title: clippy
description: A bunch of lints to catch common mistakes and improve your Rust code

title: bindgen
description: Automatically generates Rust FFI bindings to C and C++ libraries.
